scripts.install:all: npm run install:python && npm run install:ts
scripts.install:python:dev: cd quivr-service && pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt
scripts.setup: cp .env.example .env && cp quivr-service/.env.example quivr-service/.env && cp typescript-client/.env.example typescript-client/.env
scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:ts
scripts.lint:python: cd quivr-service && ruff check src/ && black --check src/
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd quivr-service && ruff check --fix src/ && black src/
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:ts
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:python && npm run type-check:ts
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run type-check
